title: FAQ - How do you find the seeding rate for different cover crops?

tasks.task: Determining Cover Crop Seeding Rate and Drill Setup
subtasks: Checking seed analysis sheet for seeding rate
Calculating seeding rate using the number of acres and seed pounds if analysis sheet is unavailable
Using a bushel weight apparatus to determine seed volume for drill setting
Mathematically calculating bushel weight for seeds with mixed components
Setting drill to bushel weight for different seed types
Performing drill calibration using tarp, scales, and measuring the drive wheel circumference
Locating the seed analysis sheet in the delivery tote
Understanding the inclusion of address and shipping label behind the seed analysis sheet
Checking the tote for the presence of a plastic holder with necessary information
Adjusting drill settings based on seed analysis information and calibration
